hymn.title: We are for the Lord's recovery

layout.singingstanza: We are for the Lord's re -- cov -- ery Of the lo -- cal church; We are for the Lord's re -- cov -- ery Of the ci -- ty and the earth. Stand -- ing on the ground of one -- ness, One -- ness in the Lord, We are build -- ing up the tem -- ple Of our glor -- ious Lord. We are for the Lord's, We are for the Lord's, We are for the Lord's re -- cov -- er -- y! We are for the Lord's, We are for the Lord's, We are for the Lord's re -- cov -- ery!

lyrics.stanza: We are for the Lord's recovery Of the local church; We are for the Lord's recovery Of the city and the earth. Standing on the ground of oneness, Oneness in the Lord, We are building up the temple Of our glorious Lord.
We are for the Lord's, We are for the Lord's, We are for the Lord's recovery! We are for the Lord's, We are for the Lord's, We are for the Lord's recovery!

We are for the Lord's recovery, To our hearts so dear; When we exercise our spirit, Our vision is so clear. Babylon the Great is fallen, Satan is cast down, And the local church is builded On the local ground.
